timeline.message: making the search null safe before lower casing
changed to lower on setting the searchterm on tablerequest instead of on the getter to be better nullsafe

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't this still through an error if the search argument is null?
timeline.author: joshsadam

replies.bodyText: I don't think it should happen that a null ever gets set here, but I did it just in case in 90b5c05.
replies.author: tom114

replies.bodyText: Thanks, that looks good.  Agreed thought that it shouldn't but safe is good.
replies.author: joshsadam

timeline.message: javadoc for the table request search
Added a wait to make sure that the filter has gone away.
